Text: Earlier this week, the New Jersey Globe reported Corbett pays just $900 annually on a 5.5 acres portion of his property because of a tax break granted by the state's Farmland Assessment Act.
Cause: a tax break granted by the state's Farmland Assessment Act.
Effect: Earlier this week, the New Jersey Globe reported Corbett pays just $900 annually on a 5.5 acres portion of his property
